doc:
Michael Shepley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Shepley 0 Arthur Michael Shepley-Smith (29 September 1907 – 28 September 1961), known professionally as Michael Shepley, was a British actor, appearing in theatre, film and some television between 1929 and 1961.He was born in Plymouth, Devon. Shepley made his screen début in the 1931 Twickenham Studios film Black Coffee. He went on to appear in more than sixty films, the last of which was Don't Bother to Knock in 1961, the year of his death. Arthur_Michael_Shepley-Smith ( 29_September_1907 – 28_September_1961 ) , known professionally as Michael_Shepley , was a_British_actor , appearing in theatre_,_film and some_television between 1929_and_1961 . He was_born in Plymouth , Devon . Shepley made his_screen_début in the_1931_Twickenham_Studios_film Black_Coffee . He went on to_appear in more_than_sixty_films , the_last of which was Do_n't_Bother_to_Knock in 1961 , the_year of his_death .
